mapper.insert: insert into order_item(id, order_id, product_id, status, seller, quantity, total_price, review_writable) values (order_item_seq.nextval,#{orderId},#{productId},#{status},#{seller},#{quantity},#{totalPrice},#{reviewWritable})
mapper.select: select id as product_id, name as product_name, '${url}'|| (select pi.name from product_image pi where pi.product_id=p.id and rownum=1) as image from product p where id=(select product_id from order_item where id=#{orderItemId} and review_writable=1)
